mapper.select: select employee_id, employee_name, employee_password, employee_online, employee_last_login_time from employee

SELECT employee.employee_id, employee.employee_name, employee.employee_password, employee.employee_online, employee.employee_last_login_time, employee_detail.employee_detail_id, employee_detail.employee_detail_gender, employee_detail.employee_detail_birthday, employee_detail.employee_detail_address, employee_detail.employee_detail_phone, employee_detail.employee_detail_identity, employee_detail.employee_detail_entry_time, employee_detail.employee_detail_email, employee_detail.employee_detail_descript, employee_detail.employee_detail_status, employee_detail.employee_id, employee_detail.position_id, employee_detail.branch_id, employee_detail.title_id FROM employee , employee_detail WHERE employee.employee_id = employee_detail.employee_id AND employee_detail.employee_id = #{employeeId}

SELECT employee.employee_id, employee.employee_name, employee.employee_password, employee.employee_online, employee.employee_last_login_time, employee_detail.employee_detail_id, employee_detail.employee_detail_gender, employee_detail.employee_detail_birthday, employee_detail.employee_detail_address, employee_detail.employee_detail_phone, employee_detail.employee_detail_identity, employee_detail.employee_detail_entry_time, employee_detail.employee_detail_email, employee_detail.employee_detail_descript, employee_detail.employee_detail_status, employee_detail.employee_id, employee_detail.position_id, employee_detail.branch_id, employee_detail.title_id FROM employee, employee_detail, `position`, title WHERE employee.employee_id = employee_detail.employee_id AND employee_detail.position_id = `position`.position_id AND employee_detail.title_id = title.title_id AND employee_detail.employee_detail_status = 1 AND employee_detail.position_id = ( SELECT `position`.position_id FROM `position` WHERE `position`.position_name = '医师' ) AND ( title.title_id = 2 OR title.title_id = 1 )
mapper.insert: insert into employee(employee_name, employee_password, employee_online, employee_last_login_time) values (#{employeeName}, #{employeePassword}, #{employeeOnline}, #{employeeLastLoginTime})
mapper.update:
update employee
employee_name = #{employeeName},
employee_password = #{employeePassword},
employee_online = #{employeeOnline},
employee_last_login_time = #{employeeLastLoginTime},
where employee_id = #{employeeId}
